function.name: Route
function.description: Use this function to route ajax calls to functions in a class.

params.param: @param string $class Name of class that function is in.
@param string $function Name of function in class to call.
@param array $args Arguments to be passed to function(Optional)

function.return: @return json with error message on failure, json with return value of function.

params.param: @param array $data Array to be json encoded then outputed.
